name: Travelling Knights
description:
You are a knight travelling with a party of 46 knights. 

As the mastermind you rig different things to kill your party members so that you can have more share of the treasure.

This game was made for Blackthornprod Game Jam in a week.

The theme was "LESS IS MORE". The LESS KNIGHTS  you have the MORE TREASURE you get. Or rather MORE HEAVY your heart becomes. 

CONTROLS

A and D to move.

Space to jump.

Click Party button to know about your party.

ASSETS

Music: www.bensound.com

Art: https://itch.io

          https://opengameart.org
